headline: Trump Says He Wants to Cut Taxes. Harris’s Plan Mirrors Biden’s.
description: Donald Trump's proposed tax cuts could add nearly $4 trillion to the national debt over the next decade; Kamala Harris's economic plans resemble Biden's, aiming to reduce the deficit primarily by increasing taxes on corporations and high earners.
newsletter_headline: Trump Says He Wants to Cut Taxes. Harris’s Plan Mirrors Biden’s.
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Russia is scrambling to halt Ukraine’s surprise offensive. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: Russia is scrambling to halt Ukraine's surprise offensive
description: The Russian military is sending more troops and armored vehicles to the Kursk region in response to Ukraine's largest assault on Russian soil since the war began.
newsletter_headline: Trump Says He Wants to Cut Taxes. Harris’s Plan Mirrors Biden’s.
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Russia is scrambling to halt Ukraine’s surprise offensive. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: Israel launched an offensive in Gaza’s south

headline: A plane carrying 61 people crashed in Brazil
